ygData.subject: Lessons to be Learned.
ygData.msgSnippet: Straight Shot and Rattrap arrive at the ready room right on time as promised.  The knew they were in trouble for something the first time they had to report,

Straight Shot and Rattrap arrive at the ready room right on time as promise=
d.  The knew they were in trouble for something the first time they had to =
report, told by Leo Prime.  They knew him well, and figured that they'd get=
 a real earfull from him.  But then a second transmission told them that Tu=
cson would be talking to them instead.  Straight Shot looks to Rattrap a li=
ttle concerned.  She knew her brother well, and knew the tones of his voice=
 when he was serious about something.  She takes a seat as does Rattrap, wh=
o had to have the first word.

" I'm telln' ya this ain't fair, Straight Sh=
ot.  That little go cart started it.  He just had ta open his trap and now =
we're in serious scrap for somethn' we so did not start!  It stinks like th=
e trash compactor in the garbage bay!"

Straight Shot sighs.

" Tell me abo=
ut it. And the worst part is, Tucson is giving the lecture.  I know he's no=
t gonna let anyone off easy, just by the tone of his voice, it sounded seri=
ous.  I can't believe we're getting in trouble for sticking up for ourselve=
s.  What's so wrong about that?"

She shrugs, as Rattrap sighs.

" Ya got m=
e Prickles.  Oh yeah, your new nickname.  No offense."

She smiles.

"Nah, =
none taken, I like it.  Prickles...  That's a new one." 

Rattrap tries to =
muster a smile.

" Kinda like when I used ta call your brother, Wheels..  H=
mm, now I think I better call him Wings.  They're big enough. Anyway, I won=
der what he's gonna say ta us and what kinda punishments he's got planned. =
Ya know he's gonna do that, right?"

Straight Shot nodds.

"Yup.  Guess we =
just take what comes."

They now sit patiently and wait for Wheelie to come=
 in.
